item.title: Welcome to my blog
item.description: Hello there üëãüèª (as Obi-Wan Kenobi would say)! I’m Aldo (as you may have guessed), a software engineer who has been writing code for over a decade. I used to work for different companies (ranging from Banks to Startups), and at some point 7 years ago, I decided to switch to freelancing. More recently I set up 41North with my partner Brian. In this space, you’ll find different types of posts, but primarily those related to the things that I care about most these days (i.
